sentences.en: A sense of period was evoked by complementing pictures with appropriate furniture.
sentences.cn: 给照片配上一些合适的家具，唤起了一种年代感。

sentences.en: All of their furniture was upholstered in flowery materials.
sentences.cn: 他们所有的家具都套了花面料套子。

sentences.en: Buying budget-priced furniture needn't mean compromising on quality or style.
sentences.cn: 买价钱经济的家具并不意味着就要牺牲质量和样式。

sentences.en: Buying expensive furniture is not necessarily the smartest move to make.
sentences.cn: 购买昂贵的家具不见得就是最明智之举。

sentences.en: Francis Watson was far from being merely a furniture expert.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西斯·沃森远远不止是个家具行家。

sentences.en: Furniture can also be custom-made to suit your own requirements.
sentences.cn: 你也可以按照自己的要求定制家具。

sentences.en: Furniture is so bulky, it takes so much room.
sentences.cn: 家具体积太大，占了太多空间。

sentences.en: He builds furniture using wooden pegs instead of nails.
sentences.cn: 他用木楔子取代钉子制作家具。

sentences.en: I can’t think of a single piece of furniture in my house that I bought new.
sentences.cn: 我想不出家里有哪件家具是新买的。

sentences.en: I helped him choose the furniture for his house.
sentences.cn: 我帮他挑选房子里用的家具。

sentences.en: Some types of garden furniture must be stored inside in the winter.
sentences.cn: 有几类花园家具冬季必须存放在室内。

sentences.en: Suppliers add computer consumables, office equipment and furniture to their product range.
sentences.cn: 供货商在其产品范围中增加了计算机耗材、办公设备和家具。

sentences.en: The furniture was stiff, uncomfortable, too delicate, and too neat.
sentences.cn: 家具又硬又不舒服，太不结实而且太小巧。

sentences.en: The house is crammed with priceless furniture and works of art.
sentences.cn: 房子里摆满了昂贵的家具和艺术品。

sentences.en: Their room was bare of furniture and they lived off porridge.
sentences.cn: 他们家徒四壁，靠喝粥度日。

sentences.en: They were reported to be unloading trucks filled with looted furniture.
sentences.cn: 有人举报说他们正在从满满当当的卡车上卸洗劫来的家具。

sentences.en: When she returned, she found Malcolm had rearranged all her furniture.
sentences.cn: 她回家时，发现马尔科姆把她所有的家具都重新摆放了。

phrases.tran_cn: 古董家具；古典家具；古式家具
(非正式)习以为常（或司空见惯）的人（或物）

trans.tran_en: large objects such as chairs, tables, beds, and cupboards
